website_summaries.verdict: This striking buffet table is crafted using elm and pine wood with a painted quartz gray finish.
pros: Two cabinets and four drawers offer enough storage for your dining wares, with ample surface space to boot
Heavy-duty elm and pine wood make up this sturdy buffet cabinet
cons: Smaller than many of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT in every way
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT in every way! Put this item together buy my self..58 yr old woman. Did need to have son help stand upright as it is a little heavy! I was looking for something to display pictures on and also storage for grandchildren toys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Deslatte

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table. A little darker than the picture shows. Reminds me of the shore houses. Super easy to put together. Comes with 16 Allen head screws and washers. Even comes with the Allen key to put it together. All together it’s four parts the top with the drawers assembled, the two legs and the bottom board. Everything is predrilled took me ten minutes at most to put it together also it’s light weight but not cheap light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for entryway.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this table. The color is accurate, it's a light blue. The top is really pretty. Easy enough to put together although the screw holes didn't line up really well. When it was done, the table was uneven as well. My husband put little pads under the legs to protect our floors and that evened it up. Looks great in our entryway! We fit four baskets across the bottom shelf for the kids to put shoes in.
customer_reviews.author: Kate N.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture, and the construction is pretty good. Unfortunately, mine arrived with some damage; a big chip on the top corner. I'm going to fish around in the box to see if I can find the piece that broke off so I can glue it back on. Otherwise it really does look nice. My only other complaint is the cheap styrofoam packing that breaks apart into a zillion pieces when you unpack the table. Unpack the box outside if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony peters

customer_reviews.title: I’m in loveeee!
customer_reviews.text: This one I was so excited for it to come and I wasn’t disappointed. It can hold a 55” TV and you won’t feel like it will crumble on you. It’s not delicate but it looks delicate, although I would recommend covering the top with something to prevent scratching and keep its shiny look. The only thing I didn’t like, there was a crack inside it, you can only see it from inside the locker but I expected my “new” product to be in great, or excellent shape. Nonetheless, it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This item turned out great. Most of my furniture is old and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This item turned out great. Most of my furniture is old and I rarely buy new pieces because it seems like they are just lower quality and look cheap. Not this piece, it looks excellent next to my vintage furniture. It is very well made and very sturdy. I will caution that it is delivered in a very heavy and large box. I had to unpack it on my porch to get it inside, so just be aware of that if you need to avoid heavy lifting. The item is light enough to move on your own once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! It made a great addition to my narrow entryway. It gives me so much storage. It was very easy to assemble. You just have to attach large side pieces and lower shelf. The cabinet and door piece is already assembled. It would be better if the little drawers pulled out smoothly but I can overlook for the price. Color is not celedon in person. It is more like a darker muted Tiffany blue. Still pretty but not a light minty green.
customer_reviews.author: Jdh0801

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately for us
customer_reviews.text: Knocked one star off of my review because the color is nowhere near the picture, and could potentially cause problems if you're expecting a neutral gray. This is FAR more a green/blue color with gray undertones than the picture would lead you to believe. Fortunately for us, I was torn between a gray or muted teal sideboard, so I inadvertantly ended up with the best of both worlds! Works for me, may not work for some. Assembly was easy and the pieces were packaged with care. Solid piece for the price -wood, NOT composite!
customer_reviews.author: ConvivialMama

customer_reviews.title: So in love!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a storage or accent cabinet to make a shabby chic coffee and tea station. It took my husband 20 mins to put together, and gave no difficulties at all. The directions were straight forward and the parts and tools needed were in a convenient little bag. We changed the nobs to go with my shabby chic theme. The quality is very good and it’s a great looking addition in my home. The blue is like a pale navy or slate blue. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cottncandysweetmom

customer_reviews.title: It's Looks Great...Mostly
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the color but I love it...mostly. It was so easy to put together and it's nice and heavy. The reason I'm not giving it five stars is because the drawers are crooked. The two side doors fit perfectly but the four drawers in the middle don't sit straight. So, when you're looking right at the front of the sideboard, the drawers are obvious. It's annoying but I love the color and the style. It works exactly as I need it to work. I just wish I could figure out how to straighten the doors.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: Well made, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill in a little nook at the top of the stairs. It arrived quickly, I was able to put it together myself and it looks so nice. The entire piece is solid wood, I’m very happy with it. Only thing to be aware of is the color on the French Gray differs from the photo. The coloring looks very delicate online, but in person it is much deeper, darker. It still went with my other furnishings, so I kept it and glad I did, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie2503

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive! Fits area perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this French grey cabinet! The storage is great, I got it to hide cords from tv but it really looks great and is very functional! Color is pretty true to description and matches my bed side tables, also bought from this company in French grey. Other companies sell this brand so do your homework and check our prices!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's even more beautiful than pictured. AND more spacious! I have my own skincare line so I have a LOT of ingredients that I have had on a huge gnarly bakers rack in my kitchen. ALL my oils (4-8oz) fit in the 4 super deep drawers. My fruit butters, clays and other powders all fit nicely in the 2 cabinets. That leaves the bottom shelf for mixers, tools, etc... And the top for a few decorative bottles with working space left over!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Not Made in America as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product appears fine and was easy to assemble. What really upset me was the fact that the product is advertised as made in America, but according to the packaging, it’s made in China. Nothing really bothers me, but that rubbed me the wrong way. I bought the Safavieh version over 3 others, and paid more money for it, because it was advertised as made in America. The low review is solely due to the deceptive advertising.
customer_reviews.author: AtisS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: After reading the first couple reviews I was a little leary about ordering this product. The color is very nice, I thought it was very similar to what is pictured. It is a lovely gray blue. It coordinates perfectly with our home and is a great accent piece. Assembly was quick and easy, just the sides and bottom shelf need to be put together. The drawers are somewhat cheap but functional. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: amc

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sideboard in My Dining Area!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, it is exactly as described and a good price. It arrived a day early which was great and was mostly pre-assembled. I just had to attach the legs and bottom shelf which took about 20 minutes. It has just the right amount of storage for my purposes and the drawers and cabinet doors open nicely. Thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Westside Susie

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly, sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: easy assembly, sturdy piece. only downfall is that a piece of the paint or coating was chipped off when we received it. Not worth taking it apart and trying to send it back. but still very frustrating as it is a beautiful piece otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sideboard
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase. The piece fit in a narrow area as I hoped. I use the top as a place to charge phones, but I also decorated it nicely so that it is a pretty eye-catching sideboard that beautifies the area.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri R.

customer_reviews.title: I found the perfect sideboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great sideboard! I spent months looking for one. I ordered a few from Target and they came broken or chipped and they were made out of crappy particle board. This one was delivered partially assembled and is real wood! It's a great grey color with a natural wood top.
customer_reviews.author: John Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged; there is a scratch and also a door does not stay closed. The clash is not attached correctly. I've had this for one year and it still drives me crazy that the door on the right is always slightly open. It is a BEAUTIFUL color and gorgeous shape, but frustrating to get a damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not solid
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and was very easy to put together. It essentially came in four peices to put together. However, the quality is very cheap. It is not very heavy or solid. I can't foresee this table lasting too long. It is definitely not worth the $300. I figured for that price it would have had some quality behind it. If it wasn't so expensive to return, I wouldn't keep it or buy it again. Go to Walmart and get yourself a simar table for the $125-175 range for the same value as this table.
customer_reviews.author: rita schaller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Came fast. No chipped or defective pieces. Took less than 20 min to assemble with 2 people. Not at all wobbly. I replaced the knobs. Looks great and fits my 48" tv perfect. The small square drawers fit dvds nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Duff

customer_reviews.title: High quality sideboard and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. The components are entirely hardwood and assembly was easy, though I'd recommend having someone help you get the sides on. The storage is surprisingly ample (deep cabinets, deep drawers) and now I have a place to keep ugly DVD cases out of sight and mind. As a foyer console table, it's just the right height and the color is just like the picture. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and attractive. Can be used in many rooms. I bought the red one for my husbands wine paraphernalia to be stored in and we use it in the dining room where it also is used sometimes as a buffet server.
customer_reviews.author: LOU

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. Easy assembly, very solid, and no damage. Only drawback is extreme stink of unit on arrival. Smells of paint/fumes. It lasts a week and starts to fade.
customer_reviews.author: J-bles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful antique distressed blue
customer_reviews.text: Love the light antique blue looks beautiful a little bit wobbly but comes with wall mount pieces for young kids safety. Assembled it myself easily with tools included and I hardly ever put anything together. Using it for a place to put my keys and the small drawers to sort my nail have a few blankets underneath on the large shelf looks beautiful in my new living room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, picture's color doesn't match product's color
customer_reviews.text: Dents and chips upon arrival. Photography does NOT much what arrived. Picture shows it as a sea foam light green and was edited, but it's teal in person. Good quality otherwise and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I thought! Beautiful color -like a slate blue! I store my crock pot on the bottom shelf, cloth napkins and kitchen towels (seasonal) in the small drawers, two cabinets hold a lot also.
customer_reviews.author: SC Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition, easy to build. About a week later I hit one of the legs and chipped it. It seems to chip easily. I’m not sure how I will match the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this sideboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this sideboard. It was easy to put together and seems to be good quality. It looks great in my living room. The only issue I had was that one screw was missing a head (it looked broken off). I found a replacement screw at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pkg. super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Perfect pkg. super easy to assemble. 12 screws, 12 washers and an Allen wrench all included. Beautiful color. Zero complaints. I recommend tightening the screws at the end. I can't believe how easy it was to assemble. Thrill and no headaches.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cabinet. Arrived in perfect condition, easy and quick to assemble. Didn’t attach to the wall; stable, even though it stands on carpet.....but.....don’t have kiddies or pets! Colour as expected.....live it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece! Very easy to put together. Took less than 30 minutes. Great quality. Great price. Would recommend. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chillababy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and sturdy. Very easy to install probably at most 10 minutes of time.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture, and the construction is pretty good. Unfortunately, mine arrived with some damage; a big chip on the top corner.Very easy to put together. It took me about 15 minutes once it was out of the box. It is a much darker gray than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: marian lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfects our hallway
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our hallway, it helps us stay organized and display our favorites
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Call

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clean looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This sits against the wall at the end of the bed. It makes a great stand for my flat screen tv. It has several drawers which makes it useful. It’s a nice French blue/grey. Just as presented in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Davie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture, nicely packaged and easy to assemble. Looks amazing at my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: This was the easiest thing I have put together in ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest thing I have put together in ages, it came with only 12 bolts to complete the assembly and it took about 10 minutes. I just bought it but it seems to be well made also.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Nice look .
customer_reviews.text: We are using it ad a small bar. Storage is perfect for what we need it for. Nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Cil King

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Wood is so rough it is easy to get slivers just putting it together. Finish is splotchy and very uneven. Would never recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good finish, great packaging for shipping, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this piece! Great price, great finish. Packaged REALLY well.
customer_reviews.author: Darrelltwo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It came mostly assembled only requiring the legs and bottom shelf to be attached. The color is beautiful and construction feels very solid.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: the beauty
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly as pictured,and thats rare online...so easy to put together also..looks fantastic in dining room w/a big bowl of lemons on top...love it and so everyone else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautiful. Has a nice amount of storage and smells like real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal G.

customer_reviews.title: My wife fell in love with it when she saw it at the Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell in love with it when she saw it at the Amazon.com site. It arrived very quickly and was a snap to put together. Great product, good quality, good service.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonblackey

customer_reviews.title: What a great table! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: What a great table! Looks great! Really good quality for price. Easy to assemble, just had one hole that had not been pre-drilled all the way through the wood. A quick drill got it completed.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I whitewashed it! It was super easy to white wash, put together and goes perfect in my rustic home.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of furniture and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture and very well made. Its strong and sturdy, most of it is made of wood with the exception of the base, but it is strong as well, no big deal. Assembly is a piece of cake, a caveman can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I was hoping for. Easy assembly, perfect size. Much nicer than expected for the great price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and people are correct - assembly is extremely simple (10-20 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safavieh Charlotte Sideboard
customer_reviews.text: great price for a lovely piece of furniture. simple assembly, packaged very well. it took longer to unpack it than assemble it. just put on the legs and you are ready to enjoy! we also purchased a Safavieh desk which is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: linda drong

customer_reviews.title: Love the distressed black/painted wood
customer_reviews.text: Love the distressed black/painted wood. The picture doesn't show how light the top is vs the rest so I'm uploading my own. I love it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Arsenal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice accent piece.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late but worth it! Buyer beware color is darker than shown.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Hushon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to add additional storage in my dining room. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: GalSal

customer_reviews.title: quality very nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color it really adds a nice pop to the room, quality and style we great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharry Coty

customer_reviews.title: Awesoms quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality and super easy to put together. Ikea watch out.
customer_reviews.author: A Priz

customer_reviews.title: looks great. A few minor cosmetic issues that I touched ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks great. A few minor cosmetic issues that I touched up - great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble, as it came mostly pre-assembled. The color is unique and it looks great in our entryway. It is sturdy and adds a lot of storage space while looking very neat and 'shabby chic'. I get a lot of compliments on it from guests! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Morabito

customer_reviews.title: ... it fits my room perfectly and I was actually glad it was not bigger
customer_reviews.text: Looks smaller than expected but it fits my room perfectly and I was actually glad it was not bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cruz

customer_reviews.title: safavieh american home collection side board
customer_reviews.text: it looks great and was easy put together. Also love the color in light blue, gives it a farmhouse feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Stewart

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for the perfect item for a coffee bar, and I found it. Good height, and length. Beautiful color. Was easy to put together also, had it put together in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this piece for my kitchen. Looks great, very good value. Color was a darker green than pictured but still nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Greatescaper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little coffee bar!
customer_reviews.text: This was SUPER easy to assemble and I did it by myself in less than 1 hour. It was fairly true to color and I am using it in my business as a self-serve coffee area. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my small dining room and the exact "look" I wanted. It helps tie together the rest of the room which is a mix of antiques and cottage pieces, some of which are mahogany and some black with an antique finish. The sideboard was very easy to put together, the easiest of any I have experienced, since the main part comes already assembled, and I think the styling and finish make the piece look like a much more expensive piece of furniture. I looked through a lot of other pieces before having the good fortune to find this one. I have several Savafieh which have turned out to be great additions to my home also.
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Got the oak color and it's true to the pictures. No damage and my daughter was able to put together in just over an hour. It's a beautiful and sturdy piece of furniture and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was really wowed by how solid this piece is. It’s incredibly well built especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mills

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beachy feel! Good quality sideboard!.
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece! Placed it under a painting that is a sea-scape with a "weathered" wooden frame. It matches perfectly. The area now feels like a peaceful beach scene. The table is a good size (typical for sideboard or sofa table) and is quite sturdy. It was simple to put together. The colors of the table are fairly true to the picture. The drawers and cabinets are quite functional for storage. It arrived in three days well-packaged with plenty of thick, messy styrofoam. They appear to have addressed the issues of packaging from the 2012-13 reviews. I very much recommend this fun, pretty sofa table.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, stable, I changed the knobs and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece. well constructed and minor dings from the shipping. Took maybe 30 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: michael w. locke

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece! I like the color even better in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece! I like the color even better in person! Shipped quickly and it was easy to assemble. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: beautiful side table
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous side table. very nice quality and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It truly complements my dining room. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Asya Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Safavieh sideboard
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture. Easy to assemble and looks beautiful in my dining room
customer_reviews.author: PinkRose

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be better than the picture and even more perfect for our particular decor. It's a definite blue-gray, but darker than the photo would indicate. It's by no means dark, but definitely darker than shown. But the size, design, functionality and price, for a sideboard for a more limited space, is perfect. Assembly was a piece of cake. Only negative is is comes packed in that crumbly awful styrofoam instead of a more cohesive form of packing. But no dings, no scratching -- just right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Arconti

customer_reviews.title: I loved everything about this piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this piece of furniture. It was easy to put together and perfect for extra storage in my breakfast room. The color goes very well with my decor. I would not change a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It's exactly what I was looking for. It came very well packaged and didn't take my son any time at all to assemble. Well constructed. Also, Price on Azon was less expensive than on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zapor

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to assemble and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Came with some scratches. Was easy to assemble and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome, does excatly what i had bought it for
customer_reviews.author: MadHunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made. and will enjoy for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great but color isn't accurate
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, super easy to put together. Color is darker than the picture -- more of a dusky blue.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Barber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made/ very easy to put together also which gets 5 stars for me/ really compliments my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly and is made out of solid wood, no particle board. It was easy to put together. There are gouges in the wood and the doors and drawers are not all that straight but they do work with some scraping noise. I go for that "rustic" style in my decorating so it is ok but it isn't great. I do like the color of the wood and knobs/hinges.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Great entry table
customer_reviews.text: Great entry table. I love it! Bad smell inside drawers but I put Coast soap and candles in each one and the left the doors open for about a week. It's fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. But if you were planning on actually putting ...
customer_reviews.text: When putting this together I found that the holes don't match up where the cabinet is when connecting the legs. There are 2 screws on each side as opposed to 4. I'm weary of putting too much weight on it now. Since this is for the office and will not have much weight, it will do. It looks great. But if you were planning on actually putting a lot of stuff on here, the holes won't match up when putting the screws in. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece and was very easy to construct.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: I love it's color and it's a sold piece
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected, I love it's color and it's a sold piece.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Sobczak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful piece of furniture that adds some character to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Tobler

customer_reviews.title: but overall great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: A few additional cracks on the face of the piece, but overall great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality, bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This sideboard is wonderful: true to description, teal blue and very pleasant shade of weathered oak ( and I normally don't like oak) . I put it together myself, which was a breeze. The product is versatile: looks terrific in the kitchen or office. The only complain I have is the packaging: rather excessive , with lots of white plastic that is non recyclable. I find it ridiculous that now I have to pay for getting rid of the packaging! I'll think twice before ordering furniture online again.
customer_reviews.author: MissPicky

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: The piece of furniture looks like the picture and matches great to the wood in my dining. Very easy to put together. Very sturdy and is a nice size. Compliments the look of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color was better than I expected. Including the stained top.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to
customer_reviews.text: Get many compliments. I use it in a medical office waiting room. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Donna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color, average quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to our dining room. The color (blue) is gorgeous and the look is stylish. However, the quality is average. Some of the drawers stick a bit; maybe that will change with a little wear. Also, some of the parts came a little chipped. It will be hard to match the paint to fix that. Either way, we are really happy with the purchase. It is a great piece that provides extra storage space for silverware, glasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: violetcherry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with some damage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece and easy to put together. Giving two stars because it arrived with a gouge in the top and several scuffs/scratches in the finish. Easy enough to touch up the scuffs, but the gouge will require some work. Too much trouble to send back. Be sure you look this over BEFORE putting together. There was so much styrofoam stuck to it, didn't even see the gouge until it was fully assembled and cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: I really love everything about this table
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about this table....However on the day I received it I noticed it was on sale for 10 % off..Not happy about that...
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Great side table
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. It took me about 15 minutes once it was out of the box. It is a much darker gray than the picture shows - almost a clay color. I didn't know if it would match in my kitchen, but I think the contrast is nice! And the top is quite solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Moore

customer_reviews.title: good value!
customer_reviews.text: nice little unit for the money....fit perfectly for my application....
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: The color is a little darker than expected. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little darker than expected. The piece came damaged in multiple places, a huge chunk out of the bottom that's not visible unless you are really looking, and the finish overall is inconsistent. Scratches and imperfections everywhere. Plus the two holes for screws on the legs were not drilled on the cabinet piece. It's too much of hassle to return so my only option is to distress the piece to cover the imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This buffet arrived today. It looks great from far away. Really pretty piece from a distance. But as soon as you get close, you see that it is terrible quality. We are extremely dissappointed with this. There is no way to fix it on our own. Trying to figure out now how to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Safavieh American Homes Collection Charlotte Sideboard, French Grey
product_meta.description: Color:French GreyThe Charlotte sideboard by Safavieh is a godsend for those in dire need of extra storage. Crafted from elm and pine in an ash grey finish, this casual sideboard proves the perfect companion to country styled kitchens, living rooms and dens. Charlotte features four drawers, two cabinets and a bottom shelf.
feature_bullets: The ash grey finish of this sideboard will create a perfect accent to your home
Crafted of sturdy elm and pine woods
Perfect for any dining room, or in a living room, family room, den, library, or study
Assembly required, this sideboard measures 45.7" x 15" x 34"
Regular attention and maintenance of fine furniture can ensure its beauty for years to come

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
